transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hi, good afternoon sir. IndiaMART se main bol rahi hu.
Customer: Yes tell me.
Executive: Sir actually I just call you regarding your feedback you have called on customer care number. So just tell me how can I help you?
Customer: No, I have contacted because my designated IndiaMART manager didn't respond me properly, that's why.
Executive: Okay, your account manager is Anshika. So she is trying to calling you but you are not responding. So can I ask her to give you a call back or you can just tell me if there is any issue in services so we'll guide you sir?
Customer: Uh, no, I think nobody had called me. Okay, whatever let her call after 2:00 p.m. okay?
Executive: After 2:00 p.m. sure. So just tell me one thing, I'll arrange a call back after 2:00 p.m. then we can close this feedback because we just open a ticket that you have called on customer care number regarding the connect with your account manager, okay?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: I'll give you a call back sir. Thank you sir.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Designated IndiaMART manager didn't respond properly.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a call back from account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will call after 2:00 p.m.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, call back, feedback
